channel.title: demo on Chris Havlin
channel.description: Recent content in demo on Chris Havlin

item.title: yt templating
item.description: I recently started working on a CookieCutter template for yt called ytcookiecutter!

item.title: yt idv Streamlines
item.description: I’ve been working on and off on adding support to yt_idv for plotting arbitrary curves along with the other rendering elements.

item.title: Plotting Dask Futures
item.description: In working on some yt-dask refactoring a question came up as to whether or not we could return data from distributed dask workflows as it completes and do something with it.
